ElevatorWarningGnome_16.text: Erm. Shouldn't we go grab that Moonlantern before wandering into what sounds an awful lot like an abyss?

ElevatorWarningGnome_44.speaker: Player
ElevatorWarningGnome_44.text: That Moonlantern is key to our survival. And that means freeing Nere.

ElevatorWarningGnome_40.speaker: Player
ElevatorWarningGnome_40.text: We should move on, 'death-dark' or not.

ElevatorWarningGnome_31.speaker: Astarion
ElevatorWarningGnome_31.text: Let's just go, Nere and the Moonlantern be damned. After everything we've been through, I think we can handle a few shadows.

ElevatorWarningGnome_49.speaker: Wyll
ElevatorWarningGnome_49.text: I'm not so keen on taking a shadow-nap, myself. We need to free Nere and get that Moonlantern.

ElevatorWarningGnome_30.speaker: Gale
ElevatorWarningGnome_30.text: 'Death-dark' doesn't sound very inviting. Can't say I fancy our chances without freeing Nere and getting that Moonlantern.

ElevatorWarningGnome_10.speaker: Lae'zel
ElevatorWarningGnome_10.text: He speaks of the shadow curse. Forget Nere and the Moonlantern - if we're this close to the surface, we must chance the journey.

ElevatorWarningGnome_15.speaker: Shadowheart
ElevatorWarningGnome_15.text: Sounds like the shadow curse. We must be getting close. Forget Nere and the Moonlantern -  let's just press on.

ElevatorWarningGnome_8.speaker: Karlach
ElevatorWarningGnome_8.text: Must be the shadow curse. I really don't think we should go wandering in without protection.

ElevatorWarningGnome_26.speaker: Player
ElevatorWarningGnome_26.text: That Moonlantern is key to our survival. And that means freeing Nere.

ElevatorWarningGnome_20.speaker: Lae'zel
ElevatorWarningGnome_20.text: Chk - more time wasted. If only you feared the ghaik parasite half as much as you fear the dark.

ElevatorWarningGnome_19.speaker: Shadowheart
ElevatorWarningGnome_19.text: Let's just hope you're right. Otherwise we're just aiding the enemy.

ElevatorWarningGnome_33.speaker: Astarion
ElevatorWarningGnome_33.text: Afraid of the dark, are we? Very well - let us save Nere, if we must.
ElevatorWarningGnome_33.context: NodeContext: [Astarion - with a sigh before 'very well']

ElevatorWarningGnome_39.speaker: Wyll
ElevatorWarningGnome_39.text: There we have it. Let 'Operation Free Nere' commence.

ElevatorWarningGnome_46.speaker: Player
ElevatorWarningGnome_46.text: Moonrise Towers holds the answers we seek. Curse or not, we can't turn back now.

ElevatorWarningGnome_2.speaker: Lae'zel
ElevatorWarningGnome_2.text: Forward, then. No curse will keep me from purification.

ElevatorWarningGnome_43.speaker: Shadowheart
ElevatorWarningGnome_43.text: Good. After all we've been through, this is hardly the time to falter.
ElevatorWarningGnome_43.context: NodeContext: Approving of the player's decision to press onwards through danger to their goal

ElevatorWarningGnome_38.speaker: Karlach
ElevatorWarningGnome_38.text: It's your funeral. And mine. I'm not ready!

ElevatorWarningGnome_11.speaker: Astarion
ElevatorWarningGnome_11.text: Excellent. The less time I have to spend with these underdwarves, the better. Present company excluded, of course.

ElevatorWarningGnome_14.speaker: Wyll
ElevatorWarningGnome_14.text: So we're going up there without the lantern? I hope you know what you're doing.

ElevatorWarningGnome_32.speaker: Gale
ElevatorWarningGnome_32.text: A stab in the dark it is...

ElevatorWarningGnome_27.speaker: Astarion
ElevatorWarningGnome_27.text: If the cure's in Moonrise, we should go, Nere and his lantern be damned. After all, 'shadows' will be the least of our worries if we start to turn.

ElevatorWarningGnome_12.speaker: Wyll
ElevatorWarningGnome_12.text: The shadow curse. We'll need that Moonlantern from Nere to survive the journey to Moonrise Towers.

ElevatorWarningGnome_21.speaker: Gale
ElevatorWarningGnome_21.text: We were warned about the curse. Can't say I fancy our chances without a Moonlantern.

ElevatorWarningGnome_3.speaker: Player
ElevatorWarningGnome_3.text: Whatever. I'm not afraid of the dark.

ElevatorWarningGnome_53.speaker: Skickpit
ElevatorWarningGnome_53.text: Well you should be. That stuff will end you in two flaps of a batwing.

ElevatorWarningGnome_29.speaker: Player
ElevatorWarningGnome_29.text: Thanks for sharing. I'll keep it in mind.

ElevatorWarningGnome_4.speaker: Player
ElevatorWarningGnome_4.text: I do have a Moonlantern, as it happens. Right here in my pouch.

ElevatorWarningGnome_17.speaker: Skickpit
ElevatorWarningGnome_17.text: Shit - good thing, too. You won't get far without one.

ElevatorWarningGnome_36.speaker: Player
ElevatorWarningGnome_36.text: I don't have a Moonlantern. So what?

ElevatorWarningGnome_54.speaker: Skickpit
ElevatorWarningGnome_54.text: So you won't be getting far - not without one of Nere's magic lamps.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_35.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_35.text: Shit. Brithvar's kicked the tankard. Prick was older than dirt.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_65.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_65.text: Here's your cut. Half the spoils, like Brithvar said. ([463b0f43-5410-412d-aba3-875cf81c38ca])

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_28.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_28.text: Here's your cut. Just like Brithvar said. ([6057ad05-9492-4630-9f0a-be548b134c54])

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_66.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_66.text: Listen up, Clan Flameshade - we need to cut and run.
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_66.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in generalNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_3.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_3.text: It's time I scram, before the buggers at Moonrise charge in.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_10.speaker: Player
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_10.text: And the slaves? What about them?

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_1.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_1.text: They belong to the clan. They're coming with us.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_37.speaker: Wyll
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_37.text: Speak up, chief. You can't just let the clan keep them.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_48.speaker: Player
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_48.text: Good idea. They're a valuable asset.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_14.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_14.text: Damn right. We'll keep them busy - this isn't their last dig.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_26.speaker: Wyll
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_26.text: Your heart made of stone? They deserved freedom - and you denied it.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_54.speaker: Gale
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_54.text: Brittle are the foundations upon which the houses of tyrants are built. It seems I judged you to be less brittle than you really are.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_38.speaker: Karlach
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_38.text: Whoa. Who the fuck are you?
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_38.context: NodeContext: Shocked by the player's decision

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_43.speaker: Player
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_43.text: The gnomes go free. You live. Everyone wins. Clear?

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_4.speaker: Player
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_4.text: Set them free, or I will thrash you like I thrashed Nere.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_41.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_41.text: These shitheads aren't worth the hassle. You got yourself a deal.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_20.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_20.text: Go on, then. Been itching to cut you down a peg.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_52.speaker: Player
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_52.text: Let the gnomes go. They'll just slow you down.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_23.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_23.text: You might be right about that. The more bodies we got, the slower we move.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_11.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_11.text: You're free, squatties. Get your legs moving, before I change my damn mind.
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in generalNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_64.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_64.text: Nah. They slow us down, I hold fire to their arses. You should see 'em dance!

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_30.speaker: Gale
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_30.text: The gnomes should be able to go where they please. They are not the duergar's to keep.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_7.speaker: Karlach
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_7.text: Yeah, right. No chance we're letting those bastards take the gnomes with them. Right?

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_9.speaker: Player
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_9.text: What makes Moonrise Towers such a threat?

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_42.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_42.text: Place is swarming with Absolute-buggers. And I ain't gonna mess about with 'em.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_15.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_15.text: Some General up there giving the orders, the way Nere told it.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_32.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_32.text: They got goblins, drow, gnolls, even humans - ain't no one they won't try to turn. The clans included.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_34.speaker: Player
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_34.text: Get moving. If I see you slavers again, I'll tear you apart.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_27.speaker: Player
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_27.text: Leave - and take the slaves with you. Before I change my mind.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_50.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_50.text: You think? I catch so much as a whiff of you, and I'll have you flayed and fried up for dinner.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_57.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_57.text: Now move out of here - I got shit to be doing.
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_57.context: CinematicNodeContext: Addressed to the room in general.NodeContext: Said to the room.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_46.speaker: Player
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_46.text: And the gold you owe me?

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_25.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_25.text: My pocket's been picked. Try the cadavers - probably loaded with loot.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_17.speaker: Player
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_17.text: Good idea. I'll start by adding your corpse to the pile.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_39.speaker: Player
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_39.text: Very well. I'll rummage what I can.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_59.speaker: Player
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_59.text: I am freeing these gnomes. Just try and stop me.

Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_67.speaker: Kirgrath
Mutineers_GroupFollowUp_67.text: You don't need to ask twice, jargh.
